Squizzy::

She looked at Zardus and then at LadyHawk. Not knowing fully what was 
going on."She is your mate commander?"
Her scientific curiousity was starting to run away with her. She had 
no fear of Zardus, but was filled with curiousity and the desire to 
learn everything she could. And then to put her knowledge to good 
use. 





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> There have been some new posts on the OOC Message board. Including 
the start 
> of a discussion. So drop on in (the site's at 
http://nbwrpg.tripod.com), and 
> post if you want to.
> 
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus smiles, looking down at the new addition to the Alliance 
force. THe 
> reprogramming seemed to have been completeded successfully.
> 
> "For now, you will come with me to watch Lady Hawk's experiment," 
he says, 
> turning to Lady Hawk.
> 
> "Whenever you're ready," he says to her (Lady Hawk).
